docs.lead_paragraph: HOMES from coast to coast are sprouting greenery and red berries now in line with traditions that are older than Christmas itself. But their magic is for the eye alone.

headline.main: Christmas Plan Bring a Warning; Enzymes Neutralize Effect

docs.abstract: Washington Univ, St Louis, Prof Walter H Lewis cautions against health hazards of holiday plants, including mistletoe berries; drawing (M)
docs.snippet: HOMES from coast to coast are sprouting greenery and red berries now in line with traditions that are older than  Christmas itself. But their magic is for the eye alone.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 17--The Carter Administration intends to keep in force all agreements with Taiwan except the mutual security treaty after diplomatic relations are severed on Jan. 1, a top official said today. The defense accord will be ended at the close of 1979.

headline.main: U.S. WILL CONTINUE ALL TAIPEI ACCORDS EXCEPT ON SECURITY; 60 AGREEMENTS ARE INVOLVED Official Says Commercial, Cultural and Other Links Will Be Kept After Diplomatic Break Legislation to Be Submitted U.S. to Maintain All Taiwan Pacts Except the Mutual Security Treaty New Documents Needed

docs.abstract: Article on events leading to normalization of ties (L)
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 17--The Carter Administration intends to keep in force all agreements with Taiwan except the mutual security treaty after diplomatic relations are severed on Jan. 1, a top official said today. The defense accord will be ended at the...

byline.original: By BERNARD GWERTZMAN Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: New national guidelines for the conduct of research on recombinant DNA and proposals to make them binding on virtually all scientists, including those in industry, were made public yesterday by the Government.

headline.main: NEW GUIDES ISSUED ON GENE RESEARCH; Califano Relaxes Safety Rules on Recombinant DNA Studies-- Wants Industry Included

docs.abstract: new DNA research guidelines announced by HEW Dept; will spur experiments by easing some stringent rules and exempting 5 categories of experiments from safety restrictions altogether; Sec Joseph Califano notes about 1/3 of research will be exempted; 6 categories of potentially hazardous experiments remain banned; advisory com membership to be increased from 11 to 25 (M)
docs.snippet: New national guidelines for the conduct of research on recombinant DNA and proposals to make them binding on virtually all scientists, including those in industry, were made public yesterday by the Government.
